other_tests.findings: Cytologic examination revealed poorly differentiated adenocarcinoma.
After contrast: a rim-enhancing lesion, 2.6 cm in diameter, in the right thalamus with surrounding mass effect. A smaller enhancing lesion in the left cerebral hemisphere.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Follow-up MRI showed a hypointense lesion in the right thalamus that appears hyperintense on T2-weighted imaging.

other_tests.findings: Presence of a frameshift deletion in exon 19 (2235_2249del.).
other_tests.changes_over_time: T790M mutation was identified at the time of recurrence.
